Topic.Title: Wanted: translator from german to english

Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm making the next parts of this adventure game in english... video of the Appartment at Baker Street: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LGY4thv8wG0 start online game scene 1: http://play.textadventures.co.uk/Play.a ... shar4lpujw renders and work-progress: viewtopic.php?f=5&t=5022 For this I'm looking for a native english speaker to translate my german texts into proper english. It would be helpful, if youre a bit familiar with the writing style of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and the victorian area. Greetings, V

Posts.EditableText: Hey, I might be interested in this. I'm a native English speaker and a student of German. I'm a big ACD fan and have all the stories to hand for reference as to writing style. Feel free to drop me a message.
Posts.HTML:
Hey,

I might be interested in this. I'm a native English speaker and a student of German. I'm a big ACD fan and have all the stories to hand for reference as to writing style. Feel free to drop me a message.

Posts.EditableText:
I'm up for this, I'm a native English speaker, but I used to live in Germany and have been speaking for about 12 years.  I speak at C1 standard, studying towards C2.   If you'd like to send me any German texts, I'll translate them as quickly as possible.

Regards,

Simon
